thread.title: Marianne

author: Marianne
title: Marianne
text:
We have experienced that the credit card for booking should be the same for the waiver deposit at pick-up of your car and should be the driver's credit card. If not, some companies make you pay extra costs for waiver deposit, or oblige you to underwrite an extra insurance policy.
It also happened that taking away our creditcard between 2 transactions, was charged with an extra â‚¬25 at GoldCar Alicante, although the first transaction was completed (= NOT interrupted).
The companies are definitively looking for extra reasons to charge you costs, since the rent is so low ...
